reviewText: Starts a bit slow, and gets interesting after that.

Liked better the original version from 2008...un novio para mi mujer.

I normally don't write reviews but this movie was so horrible I need to warn others. Its a story about a guy who is so sick and tired of his complaining wife that he hires a guy to seduce her because he doesn't have the guts to tell her he wants a divorce. Even though the plot was unbelievable I wanted to find something to like about this movie but in the end you need to like the main characters of a romantic comedy.  I didn't like her and I didn't like him so I didn't care if they got together or not.  Save your money and watch something else.
Didn't get too far on what seemed to be a brilliant idea
This is a very special movie; highly recommended!
Perfect chick flick, yet funny for a man.
